metadata.subject: [patchmanagement] PatchaPalooza
metadata.email_text_clean:
Something to keep an eye on… https://patchapalooza.com/
 
Delve into the universe Microsoft's security & patch updates with PatchaPalooza,
for streamlined vulnerability management. Using Microsoft's MSRC CVRF API, this
tool caters exclusively to cybersecurity professionals, bringing forth an
intuitive interface that delivers essential insights without overwhelming users
with tech jargon. 
--
%40BL3PR16MB4425.namprd16.prod.outlook.com

metadata.email_text_original:
PatchaPalooza 
You don't often get email from mjudd@360smartnet.com. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
Something to keep an eye on…    https://patchapalooza.com/
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fpatchapalooza.com%2F&data=05%7C01%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C613ab953bb86497a2f0c08dbe0843713%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638350631116405927%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C2000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=Bf%2Fl0MvzyA%2F4%2FneBOxlixggqNumUo7AhGQWXOdIv64c%3D&reserved=0] 
Delve into the universe Microsoft's security & patch updates with PatchaPalooza,
for streamlined vulnerability management. Using Microsoft's MSRC CVRF API, this
tool caters exclusively to cybersecurity professionals, bringing forth an
intuitive interface that delivers essential insights without overwhelming users
with tech jargon. 
--
